statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_id = 1;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_type = 'Farmers Market';
SELECT market_capacity, market_rating FROM market_data WHERE market_capacity > 100 ORDER BY market_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_type = 'Supermarket' AND market_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT market_name, market_capacity FROM market_data WHERE market_capacity < 50 ORDER BY market_capacity ASC, market_name DESC;
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_type FROM market_data WHERE market_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY market_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT market_name, market_location, market_capacity FROM market_data WHERE market_type = 'Farmers Market' ORDER BY market_capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_capacity >= 100 AND market_type = 'Supermarket' ORDER BY market_capacity DESC
SELECT market_name, market_rating FROM market_data WHERE market_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY market_rating DESC
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_capacity < 200 AND market_rating < 4
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends JOIN CustomerPreferences ON MarketTrends.id = CustomerPreferences.id;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'clothing' ORDER BY preference_value DESC;
SELECT AVG(preference_value) AS avg_preference_value, preference_type FROM CustomerPreferences GROUP BY preference_type;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date, market_id FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT preference_description FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProductionCosts WHERE cost_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_description FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT market_id, trend_description, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY market_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(cost_amount) AS average_cost FROM ProductionCosts WHERE cost_type = 'Labor';
SELECT customer_name, age, preference_description FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_description LIKE '%popular%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT preference_id, preference_category FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT cost_description, cost_amount FROM production_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT preference_category, preference_details FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT cost_type, cost_description, cost_amount FROM production_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;

SELECT trend_name, preference_category, cost_type FROM market_trends JOIN customer_preferences ON market_trends.trend_id = customer_preferences.preference_id JOIN production_costs ON customer_preferences.preference_id = production_costs.cost_id;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT market_name, trend_description FROM market_trends;
SELECT market_location, market_name FROM market_trends;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE market_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT market_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE market_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM market_trends
SELECT market_id, market_name FROM market_trends WHERE market_location = 'New York'
SELECT market_id, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE market_name LIKE '%technology%'
SELECT * FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_description ASC
SELECT market_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM market_trends GROUP BY market_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
